_description: Dux Moraud, or the Clerk and the Maiden — 268 lines

BodEngPoetf2.First Lines:
Emperoures & kynges be kendeErlys & barunnys
                    boldebachelerys & knytes to mende…
BodEngPoetf2.Last Lines: …Ihesu haue mercy on mesaue sowl fro hell[e]
BodEngPoetf2.Note:
A single strip attached to a roll, recto; some lines
                    illegible.
